name: biddlebubbly
text: Nice pete is even more restrictive with his image sizes than achespace. Those are bound to be some ambiguous looking murders.

name: zefiel
text:
And the person who hired you to do those impossibly small pictures ... is a killer.

Talk about working under pressure.

name: zefiel
text:
Aw, sod it, I just went and poked around in Photoshop. I give you, Pete's first Icon. [IMGS OFF]

Of course it's hard to see, it's 32x32. I blew it up some so you could see detail.

[IMGS OFF]

If there's interest I could do the rest, I guess.

name: biddlebubbly
text: That is professional as a mug. If I was less lazy, it might've replaced my teutonic knight.

name: sargasm
text: THERE IS INTEREST

name: evolume
text: A comment left by evolume was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, salvagebar, HSE, mystkmanat, nutmeg, betwixt)

name: deancain29
text: awesome

name: semiquaver
text: I made it 100 chubbies.  There is officially interest.

name: farqussus
text: Thanks zeifel

name: rainwolfj
text: Damn fine...

name: mattylite
text: Where's that guy who says "I see what you did there"?  Well, I guess I'll just be that guy here.  I see what you did there.  (it is cool that I've been going through chronologically, wondering about your avatar for 550 strips)

name: sp1derbaby
text: Me too! Nice work.

name: landowmpg
text: I'd been curious too.  Now that it's all "[IMGS OFF]" I would never have seen it.  Good job.

name: maximum-can
text: it's all [IMGS OFF]. :(

name: landowmpg
text: It's rainwolfj's avatar.

name: stuart
text: I e-mailed Onstad about this a fairly long while ago. All I can say for certain: he replied that he was going to look into fixing it, so if nothing else, he knows .

name: doc_rostov
text:
It appears Zefiel has neglected this brainchild. This is a pity. Being the respectable gentleman I am, I offer you Pete's Second Icon.

[IMGS OFF]

And here it is on a larger scale:

[IMGS OFF]

(The premise is that the gun was in the person's hand, misleading the detectives to initially think it was an open-shut suicide case. They will realize it was not when they take routine fingerprints. This was a B-class murder at best, you see. The murderer forgot to affix the murdered man's fingerprints to the gun, which will cause the police to look for DNA evidence and more than likely find what they're looking for. Those rascals!)

name: baryonyx
text:
A passerby notices that the distinct lack of a third icon, and obligingly provides one.
[IMGS OFF]
Larger Scale:
[IMGS OFF]
As you can see, not precisely a Knicks game, but a major sporting event nonetheless. The jumbotron is displaying a brutal knifing of the victim, which they are, naturally, helpless to turn off. Partway through making this it struck me what a real great, "A-1" type of murder this really was.

name: yogurtworld
text:
Through the magic of .gif, the murder can come to life! (so to speak)

[IMGS OFF]

name: gmm
text: This shit right here is what we call Assetbar Magic. EXCELLENT work, everyone.

name: jollysaintpete
text: Agreed. This asset just won awards, everywhere

name: fmercury
text: I love you both.

name: tekende
text: Aww yeah, we doin' this! Awesome work.

name: rykan
text: Excellent stuff!

name: zefiel
text: I came to hate assetbar, but GODDAMN i love this thing Baryonyx made. Also his name reminds me of a cool dinosaur, so he wins all around.

name: caseyb3
text: The next category of murders is largely the same as 'A-1', only it's a Harlem Globetrotters game opening for the Olympics.

name: mercuri0us
text: I just love how each icon is more sophisticated than the last, just like the murders.  Everyone pitched in, and really pulled off something special.  I am so damn happy.

name: dusty
text: What did we do assetbar? Why have you IMGS OFF'd us? We been true to the way! We remembered the stories! Ain't we done good?...No I didn't mean to to question you I just, nooo [DUSTYS OFF]

name: chaesar
text: Death on a Jumbotron, you can't properly represent that through something the size of two favicons.

name: invidious
text: "They said it couldn't be done... but baryonyx found a way..."

name: mashisoyo
text: No-one said it could be done.

name: stuart
text: 4 favicons. Two favicons would be 32x16.

name: epicurus
text:
Option 3 kills me.
...Oops.

name: evolume
text: that's so lame, it's chubby.

name: mthrfckr
text: Teodors terror in panel 5 makes it for me.

name: rowboat
text: Teodor hasn't been this freaked out in a while.

name: tttt
text: they are helpless to turn it off

name: stuart
text: Nice Pete does not yoke unto the Camel Case

name: ibetso
text: Nice Pete's head tilt kills me stone dead

name: dejavroom
text: INTEREST

name: cameasiam
text: IT was a high four and then I read the alt text and it makes this strip a 5.

name: tekende
text: Wait, Pat said something good about someone?

name: drago25
text: Nice Pete is the most matter-of-fact maniac in the world. He's good for society tho

name: juav
text: LOL Wonderful

name: narcolepticdog
text: "Kind of a better murder" makes this a 5 for me.

name: baryonyx
text: It's for the presentation Pete is doing at MurderCon this year. "MURDERCON '03 - The most unlawful convention, probably."

name: ryanfuss
text: "A Real Great". Nice Pete is hella in tune with his murder styles.

name: unclemikey
text: The only thing better than Nice Pete is eating a Butterfinger ice cream bar while receiving oral sex and watching Dexter. Well, not so much better as just as good as.

name: tekende
text: You know...I've never tried it, but I think I would have a problem with eating and receiving oral sex at the same time.

name: unclemikey
text: Aw, you'd be great at it, I promise

name: intergalactic_
text: Nice pete enjoys his basketball, hmm?

name: lolsworth
text: Téodor

name: dtilove
text: The most worrying thing about Nice Pete's "A-1" murder is the "etc."

name: heccibiggs
text: I don't know, I see it more as a "you know, that kind of thing". Like it's just totally normal, etc.

name: quietwyatt
text:
How nice to see Pete (in panel 4) making one of his Scannersy "force the Denny's waitress to spew blood from her anus-mouth" faces so early on.

Goddamn, do I hate Nice Pete.

name: jamb23
text: Interesting! I see that more as a "Nice Pete in the prison cell with Pat" face, discussing the merits of putting pictures of murders above babies, cutting boards minus the DNA evidence, etc.

name: rotating-dog
text: [IMGS ON]

name: woodenteeth
text: For the love of everything [IMGS ON]
